–––, 1844 [1967], Wesen des Glaubens im

Fichte, Johann Gottlieb, 1808, Reden an die deutsche

Hegel, G. W. F., 1798–99 [1971], “Der Geist des
Christentums und sein Schicksal”, unpublished
manuscript; translated as “The Spirit of Christianity and its

Theological Writings, Philadelphia, PA: University of

1948).

–––, 1821 [1991], Grundlinien der
Philosophie des Rechts, Berlin; translated as Elements of the

–––, 1830 [1999], “Address on the
Tercentenary of the Submission of the Augsburg Confession (25 June

Cambridge University Press, pp. 186–96.

–––, 1984, Hegel: The Letters, Clark
Butler and Christine Seiler (trans), Bloomington, IN: Indiana
University Press.

–––, 2009, Lectures on the History of
Philosophy 1825–6, Volume III: Medieval and Modern

–––, 2011, Lectures on the Philosophy of

(eds/trans), Oxford: Oxford University Press.

Heidegger, Martin, 1924 [2010], “Das Problem der Sünde
bei Luther”; translated as “The Problem of Sin in

Heine, Heinrich, 1835 [2007], Zur Geschichte der Religion und

–––, 1688 [2008], Historia Ecclesiastica,

–––, 1722, A True Ecclesiastical History

–––, 1999, Selections from Hobbes 1656 [1841],
